blocks.name: lmod0rng
blocks.content: If the scalar ring of a module is the zero ring, the module is the zero module, i.e. the base set of the module is the singleton consisting of the identity element only. (Contributed by AV, 17-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmod0rng(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wn(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cnzr))), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, clmod), wn(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cnzr)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, clmod), wi(wn(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cnzr)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), crg))
  lmodring(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  com23(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), crg), wcel(c0, clmod), wn(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cnzr)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))
  sylbird(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), crg), wn(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cnzr)), wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), nat1))
  0ringnnzr(cfv(csca, c0))
  ex(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), crg), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), nat1), wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cfv(csca, c0), crg), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), nat1)), wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))))
  0ring01eq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  ex(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))
  mpbird(wa(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  impl(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  com12(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  mpcom(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wi(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  lmodvs1(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))
  exp32(wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  sylan9eq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0), co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))))
  biimpi(wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0))))
  eqcom(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  sylan9eqr(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c0), co(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))))
  eqcoms(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0))))
  oveq1(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(hs0))
  lmod0vs(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  adantl(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wne(cfv(cbs, c0), emptycls))
  lmodbn0(c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqsn(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmod0rng(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß ¬¨(Scalar ` c0)‚àà NzRing)‚Üí(Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)})
} = {
  imp(c0 ‚àà LMod, ¬¨(Scalar ` c0)‚àà NzRing, (Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)})
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà LMod, (¬¨(Scalar ` c0)‚àà NzRing ‚Üí(Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)}), (Scalar ` c0)‚àà Ring)
  lmodring(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  com23((Scalar ` c0)‚àà Ring, c0 ‚àà LMod, ¬¨(Scalar ` c0)‚àà NzRing, (Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)})
  sylbird((Scalar ` c0)‚àà Ring, ¬¨(Scalar ` c0)‚àà NzRing, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚Üí(Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)}), (# `(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))= 1)
  0ringnnzr((Scalar ` c0))
  ex((Scalar ` c0)‚àà Ring, (# `(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))= 1, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚Üí(Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)}))
  syl(((Scalar ` c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß(# `(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))= 1), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚Üí(Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)}), (0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  0ring01eq((Scalar ` c0), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  ex((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)), c0 ‚àà LMod, (Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)})
  mpbird(((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚àß c0 ‚àà LMod), (Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)}, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs0 =(0 ` c0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, (Base ` c0), ((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚àß c0 ‚àà LMod), hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  impl((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)), c0 ‚àà LMod, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  com12((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  mpcom((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), ((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0)), ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0)= hs0)
  lmodvs1(c0, hs0, (Base ` c0), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (√ó ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  exp32(((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0)= hs0, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), (0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)), hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  sylan9eq(hs0, (0 ` c0), ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0), ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0)= hs0, ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0))‚àß(0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0))))
  biimpi(((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0)= hs0, hs0 =((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0))
  eqcom(((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0), hs0)
  sylan9eqr(((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0), (0 ` c0), ((0 `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), (0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqcoms((0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0)=((0 `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]hs0))
  oveq1((1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (√ó ` c0), hs0)
  lmod0vs(c0, hs0, (Base ` c0), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (√ó ` c0), (0 ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((√ó ` c0))
  eqid((0 `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  adantl((0 `(Scalar ` c0))=(1r `(Scalar ` c0)), c0 ‚àà LMod, ((Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)} ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs0 =(0 ` c0))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà LMod, ((Base ` c0)= {(0 ` c0)} ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs0 =(0 ` c0))), (Base ` c0)‚â† ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: nzrneg1ne0
blocks.content: The additive inverse of the 1 in a nonzero ring is not zero ( -1 =/= 0 ). (Contributed by AV, 29-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm nzrneg1ne0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnzr), wne(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
} = {
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cnzr), wne(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  nzrring(c0)
  1unit(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  unitnegcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  nzrunit(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nzrneg1ne0(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NzRing ‚Üí((invg ` c0)`(1r ` c0))‚â†(0 ` c0))
} = {
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà NzRing, ((invg ` c0)`(1r ` c0))‚â†(0 ` c0), ((invg ` c0)`(1r ` c0))‚àà(Unit ` c0))
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà NzRing, ((invg ` c0)`(1r ` c0))‚àà(Unit ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring, (1r ` c0)‚àà(Unit ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà NzRing, (1r ` c0)‚àà(Unit ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  nzrring(c0)
  1unit(c0, (1r ` c0), (Unit ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
  unitnegcl(c0, (1r ` c0), (Unit ` c0), (invg ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
  nzrunit(c0, ((invg ` c0)`(1r ` c0)), (Unit ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Unit ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
}

blocks.name: 0ringdif
blocks.content: A zero ring is a ring which is not a nonzero ring. (Contributed by AV, 17-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0ringdif(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wn(wcel(c0, cnzr))))
  eldif(c0, crg, cnzr)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, crg), wn(wcel(c0, cnzr)), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  3bitr3rd(wcel(c0, crg), wn(wcel(c0, cnzr)), wceq(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c0)), nat1))
  fveqeq2d(chash, c1, nat1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  impbid1(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  ex(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  0ring(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1, cfv(chash, csn(c2)), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  fveq2(c1, csn(c2), chash)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c2)), nat1), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, c0g, c0)
  hashsng(c2, universe)
  0ringnnzr(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 0ringdif(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(Ring \ NzRing)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 = { c2 }))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà(Ring \ NzRing), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 = { c2 }), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà NzRing))
  eldif(c0, crg, cnzr)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà Ring, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà NzRing, c1 = { c2 })
  3bitr3rd(c0 ‚àà Ring, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà NzRing, c1 = { c2 }, (# ` c1)= 1, (# `(Base ` c0))= 1)
  fveqeq2d(chash, c1, nat1, (Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 =(Base ` c0))
  impbid1(c0 ‚àà Ring, (# ` c1)= 1, c1 = { c2 })
  ex(c0 ‚àà Ring, (# ` c1)= 1, c1 = { c2 })
  0ring(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6eq((# ` c1), nat1, (# ` { c2 }), c1 = { c2 })
  fveq2(c1, { c2 }, chash)
  ax-mp((# ` { c2 })= 1, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c2, c0g, c0)
  hashsng(c2, universe)
  0ringnnzr(c0)
}

blocks.name: 0ringbas
blocks.content: The base set of a zero ring, a ring which is not a nonzero ring, is the singleton of the zero element. (Contributed by AV, 17-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: 0ring1eq0
blocks.content: In a zero ring, a ring which is not a nonzero ring, the unit equals the zero element. (Contributed by AV, 17-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0ring1eq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wn(wcel(c0, cnzr))))
  eldif(c0, crg, cnzr)
  imp(wcel(c0, crg), wn(wcel(c0, cnzr)), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylbird(wcel(c0, crg), wn(wcel(c0, cnzr)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c0)), nat1))
  0ringnnzr(c0)
  ex(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c0)), nat1), wceq(c1, c2))
  eqcomd(c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cbs, c0)), nat1)))
  0ring01eq(c0, cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 0ring1eq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(Ring \ NzRing)‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(1r ` c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà(Ring \ NzRing)‚Üí c1 = c2), c3 =(Base ` c0))
  sylbi(c0 ‚àà(Ring \ NzRing), c1 = c2, (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà NzRing))
  eldif(c0, crg, cnzr)
  imp(c0 ‚àà Ring, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà NzRing, c1 = c2)
  sylbird(c0 ‚àà Ring, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà NzRing, c1 = c2, (# `(Base ` c0))= 1)
  0ringnnzr(c0)
  ex(c0 ‚àà Ring, (# `(Base ` c0))= 1, c1 = c2)
  eqcomd(c1, c2, (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(# `(Base ` c0))= 1))
  0ring01eq(c0, (Base ` c0), c2, c1)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nrhmzr
blocks.content: There is no ring homomorphism from the zero ring into a nonzero ring. (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nrhmzr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wcel(c1, cnzr)), wceq(co(c0, crh, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crg, cnzr)), wcel(c1, cnzr)), wceq(co(c0, crh, c1), emptycls), wral(hs0, co(c0, crh, c1), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cfv(cur, c1)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cfv(c0g, c1)))))
